name: Color Pals
description:
Color Pals is a cute platformer puzzle game consisting of 50 levels where your objective is to get to the exit matching the correct colors along the way. Be careful, touching a block that doesn't match your color or hitting an enemy, kills you instantly.

Mechanics


You can only touch blocks, keys, and the exit that match your current color. Collect colored bolts to change colors and grab keys to open pathways!

Stars


Every level has 3 stars placed throughout. See if you can collect them all! Track all the Stars you've collected and see how many you can get!

Enemies


Watch out for the spiked enemies as they will love to kill you at any moment.
